summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SEO Article Builder app - both backend and frontend functionality tested successfully

design_issues.issue: Console shows hydration errors for table/span elements
design_issues.impact: Minor - does not affect functionality but appears in browser console

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/articles returns 1 article successfully
Backend: GET /api/stats returns correct stats (1 article, 94% avg score, 0 needing improvement)
Backend: POST /api/articles/{id}/regenerate with section=meta returns meta_title and meta_description with Polish content
Backend: POST /api/articles/{id}/export with format=facebook returns 584 character content
Backend: POST /api/articles/{id}/export with format=html returns 20102 character content
Backend: POST /api/articles/{id}/export with format=google_business returns 580 character content
Frontend: Dashboard loads with stats cards (1 article, 94% SEO score, 0 needing improvement) and article table
Frontend: Editor page loads for existing article with 13775 character visual editor content
Frontend: Article title shown in toolbar: 'Rozliczanie VAT w firmie â€“ kluczowe zasady i praktyki'
Frontend: Autosave indicator shows 'Zapisano' status correctly
Frontend: Editor Visual/HTML tabs switch correctly and show appropriate content
Frontend: Right panel SEO/FAQ/Eksport tabs switch correctly
Frontend: SEO panel shows 94% score gauge, breakdown bars, and recommendations
Frontend: FAQ tab shows 6 FAQ items with Add button and AI regenerate button
Frontend: Export tab shows all 4 cards (Facebook, Google Business, HTML, PDF)
Frontend: Meta title field shows character count (44/60) and is editable
Frontend: Meta description field shows character count (123/160) and is editable
Frontend: Regenerate button next to meta title is clickable and enabled
Frontend: Generator page uses shadcn Select components (no native select elements)
Frontend: Topics page uses shadcn Select for category dropdown with proper role='combobox' and shadcn classes

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor console warnings only
